title: BTC Monk
author: BTC Monk
created_time: May 17, 2022, 03:43:01 PMLast edit: May 17, 2022, 03:58:39 PM by BTC Monk
content: PEPKNIGHT is a pyrography artwork which was burned on plywood and painted in golden decor paint. This art peace brings very strong message to the audience during these very interesting times. Auction starts today on https://scarce.city/auctions/PEPKNIGHT https://youtu.be/uhgy-8lQ9zAMore pictures and video of creative process on https://twitter.com/BTCMonk1If you like it, please share it. Thank you in advance friends!
